    • init

      public void init​(String flavor)
      Sets up the scene with the correct flavor.
      Parameters:
      flavor - The flavor to initiate the customization menu with.

    • init

      private void init​(String titleText, String imgPath, String flavor)
      Sets up the scene using the provided inputs.
      Parameters:
      titleText - The text to display as the scene title.
      imgPath - The path to the image of the pizza
      flavor - The string representation of the pizza flavor.

    • createToppingCheckboxes

      private void createToppingCheckboxes​(javafx.scene.layout.Pane container, List<javafx.scene.control.CheckBox> checkboxes, List<Topping> toppings, boolean selected)
      Builds up the topping checkboxes that toggle toppings on the pizza and sets their default values.
      Parameters:
      container - The container pane to put the checkboxes in
      checkboxes - A List of CheckBox objects to store references in
      toppings - A List of Topping objects to generate CheckBoxes for
      selected - The default value for the checkboxes
